meaningMnemonic: While riding your <radical>scooter</radical>, you bang your <radical>forehead</radical> on the <radical>car</radical> in front. Your scooter's wrecked, so you have to <kanji>carry</kanji> it home. You'll need a lot of <kanji>luck</kanji> to get that scooter home safely.
readingMnemonic: As you <kanji>carry</kanji> the scooter, your <kanji>luck</kanji> turns, and it starts to rain, so you pull out your <reading>um</reading>brella (うん). Now you're holding your scooter, your forehead, and an umbrella.
